snippet.title: Gravity Rush Remastered - Announce Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The acclaimed PlayStation®Vita hit comes to the PlayStation®4 system. Gain a new perspective as Kat, a young girl who has lost her memory, and embark on an incredible gravity-defying adventure to save a world on the brink of destruction. Control gravity with the touch of a button to deliver devastating attacks and uncover the secrets to your own forgotten past.

(c) 2015 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. "Gravity Rush" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
